name: Bullet Heck: A scuffed and late game jam game
name_original: Bullet Heck: A scuffed and late game jam game
description:
MY FIRST ORIGINAL GODOT GAME, TOOK ME LIKE A WEEK.

IT'S BAD, IT'S RUSHED, BUT I'M STILL PROUD

MADE IT FOR THE BULLET HELL GAME JAM, BUT IT'S DUMMY LATE TO SUBMIT LMAO

GRAZE THE BULLETS AND GAIN 10 ENERGY, PRESS X TO ENERGIZE AND SHOOT BULLETS TO KILL ENEMIES AND GAIN POINTS

NO MUSIC, 20KB BIG, ONLY USED ONE SPRITE, THIS IS THE ULTIMATE MINIMUM VIABLE PRODUCT.

Known Issues: you go invisible sometimes? I have no idea why.

will probably update with new features and fixes sometime in the future
